subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter was eligible to be activated from the D.L. but instead played a simulation game. Without him, the Yankees’ offense, facing Chris Archer, remained in a state of disrepair.
snippet: Derek Jeter was eligible to be activated from the D.L. but instead played a simulation game. Without him, the Yankees’ offense, facing Chris Archer, remained in a state of disrepair.
